author: tmiychao
content:
Thanks for everyone attending standup today! Let's repeat the poll for this weeks office hours which are scheduled for tomorrow 3PM UTC: 

1) Workshop on using Ethereum clients - compiling it, using different options, connecting CL/EL, using RPC, etc.. 
2) Discussions about your projects, hangout, you can propose agenda points in advance
3) Skip the office hours this week

author: tmiychao
content:
I am excited to see so many people interested in the clients workshop! Let's do it then. Of course it's completely voluntary to attend and it will be recorded so no worries if you won't make it tomorrow. 

Here is the proposed agenda, please let me know your feedback, suggestions, I am happy to add more stuff. Let's just be careful with the content to be sure we can make it under an hour 

https://notes.ethereum.org/@MarioHavel/nodes-workshop

author: bchain99
content: this is a good resource for folks wanting to deep dive into the beacon chain https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N5DdClfLQfw

author: bchain99
content: note that its a bit outdated, since its only phase 0. eg, sync commitees were introduced in altair, there is no crosslink data field in the attestation data structure last i remember, no proposer boost when vitalik spoke about LMD ghost and some other stuff i might have missed
